title: Grilled Chicken Salad
text: Grilled chicken breast seasoned with herbs, served over mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and light balsamic vinaigrette. Low calorie, high protein meal perfect for weight loss.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry with Tofu
text: Tofu cubes stir-fried with broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snow peas, and mushrooms in a light soy-ginger sauce. Served with a small portion of brown rice. Low calorie, plant-based protein option.

title: Weight Gain Protein Shake
text: High calorie protein shake with banana, peanut butter, whey protein powder, rolled oats, whole milk, Greek yogurt, and honey. Perfect post-workout for muscle building and weight gain.

title: Salmon with Quinoa and Asparagus
text: Baked salmon fillet seasoned with lemon and dill, served with quinoa and roasted asparagus. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and high-quality protein for healthy weight management.

title: Lean Turkey Chili
text: Ground turkey cooked with kidney beans, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, and chili spices. High protein, high fiber meal that keeps you full for hours. Great for weight loss.

title: Mass Gainer Pasta Bowl
text: Whole wheat pasta with ground beef, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and olive oil. High calorie meal perfect for muscle growth and weight gain. Includes protein and complex carbs.

title: Greek Yogurt with Berries and Nuts
text: Plain Greek yogurt topped with mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries), almonds, and a drizzle of honey. High protein, low calorie snack perfect for weight loss.

title: Avocado Egg Toast with Bacon
text: Whole grain toast topped with mashed avocado, two fried eggs, and crispy bacon slices. High calorie breakfast perfect for weight gain with healthy fats and protein.

title: Zucchini Noodles with Shrimp
text: Spiralized zucchini noodles saut√©ed with garlic, olive oil, and lemon juice, topped with grilled shrimp. Low carb, low calorie meal perfect for weight loss.

title: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie Bowl
text: Thick smoothie bowl made with frozen bananas, peanut butter, protein powder, and almond milk, topped with granola, chia seeds, and coconut flakes. High calorie breakfast for weight gain.

title: Lentil Soup with Vegetables
text: Hearty lentil soup with carrots, celery, onions, and tomatoes in a vegetable broth. High fiber, plant-based protein meal that's low in calories for weight loss.

title: Cheesy Sweet Potato with Ground Beef
text: Baked sweet potato stuffed with seasoned ground beef, topped with cheddar cheese and Greek yogurt. High calorie meal with complex carbs and protein for weight gain.

title: Cottage Cheese with Pineapple
text: Low-fat cottage cheese mixed with fresh pineapple chunks and cinnamon. High protein, low calorie snack that aids in weight loss and muscle recovery.

title: Oatmeal with Protein Powder and Nuts
text: Steel-cut oats cooked with protein powder, mixed with walnuts, almonds, dried fruit, and a tablespoon of honey. High calorie breakfast perfect for weight gain and sustained energy.

title: Egg White Omelette with Vegetables
text: Fluffy omelette made with egg whites, filled with spinach, mushrooms, onions, and tomatoes. Low calorie, high protein breakfast perfect for weight loss.
